The Future of Manual Testing in 2025: Trends and Predictions

Manual testing remains a vital pillar of quality assurance, even as automation and AI technologies rapidly evolve. In this article, we explore how manual testing is adapting to the advancements in software development, including AI-driven automation, and what the future holds for QA professionals in 2025. Learn about emerging trends such as shifting-left testing, accessibility focus, test data compliance, and the role of tools like Zof AI in enhancing the efficiency of manual and exploratory testing. Discover essential skills testers need to stay competitive in the ever-changing QA landscape.
